from page 48 i think that the tradition of this family is like this. The father have a son with a wife. when the son grow up and find the girlfriend the father will steal the the son's girlfriend from him and have another child (MC). In page 51 the father give back the girlfriend to his son, mybe bacause he give the mc's girlfriend to him. I don't know NTR baby at the end is his father's child or brother's child. If there is a sequel where he take revenge i will love to see it.
